"how do you know what is safe to take for meal replacement."Since this thread is on Herbalife shakes I'm assuming you're asking the same. As commented earlier read carefully the nutrition label. Avoid those with high sugar and high carb contents. If sugar is listed under carbs, I like it it be 1 gram or less. I don't believe in eating fake foods so I cannot comment on what else they put into these shakes. Try eating foods made with whole grains, nuts and more vegies, fish, poultry and lean meats.
